actions.name: Armor Tail

cost.trigger: An [Interrupt X] Attack is declared, targeting the user or an ally in Range.

actions.description:
An [Interrupt X] Attack is declared, targeting the user or an ally in Range.

Effect: The triggering Attack fails.
